body:
### Steps to reproduce

(notebook) jovyan@jupyter-jhthomps:~$ spack list | grep opengl
opengl
openglu
(notebook) jovyan@jupyter-jhthomps:~$ spack install opengl
==> Error: There are no valid versions for opengl that match ':'

***
This seems to be the same as issue 17512 which appears to be closed. Are suggestions there still valid? You'll see that I'm running in a Python notebook environment.

### Error message

(notebook) jovyan@jupyter-jhthomps:~$ spack list | grep opengl
opengl
openglu
(notebook) jovyan@jupyter-jhthomps:~$ spack install opengl
==> Error: There are no valid versions for opengl that match ':'
(notebook) jovyan@jupyter-jhthomps:~$ 

### Information on your system

(notebook) jovyan@jupyter-jhthomps:~$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.2-3816-8f238c03ad
* **Python:** 3.8.8
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake_avx512
* **Concretizer:** original

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [X] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output
title: install OpenGL
